name: Beans and Franks
description:
Beans and Franks

Save as many Weiner dogs as you can, but watch out for the noses! Also, also, be sure to harness the power of farts to kill and block snot.

Endless, but gets harder. If you crash the game or run out of infinite tape you win? As always, all bugs are undocumented features.

All assets are original and made for TriJam167. Each person spent a maximum of 3 hours on this game.

Controls

  • Directions: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Fart: Spacebar

Credits:

  • Project Lead, Programmer - Hazel
  • Audio - Kipschwinger 
  • Art - eHawk

Tools Used:

  • Godot (Game Engine)
  • Bitwig (Audio)
  • Adobe Photoshop and AutoDesk Sketchbook (Visual Art)
